missing_data_policy: ANOVA and pairwise tests were run on complete cases after applying an SNR filter >= 2.0. Subject-condition combinations with missing latency values or below-threshold SNR were excluded listwise. Linear mixed-effects models retained all subjects with valid measurements to optimally handle missing data.

N1_latency_frac_area_ms.error: pingouin is required for ANOVA. Install with: pip install pingouin
